# Phase 3: Testing

## Objective
Comprehensive test coverage

## Complexity
Medium

## Tasks

- [ ] Write unit tests
- [ ] Create integration tests
- [ ] Add end-to-end tests
- [ ] Implement test fixtures
- [ ] Set up CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Run performance tests

## Testing

```bash
# Full test suite
npm run test:all
npm run test:coverage
```

## Expected Outcomes

- >80% test coverage
- All tests passing
- CI/CD pipeline operational
